ygData.subject: Re: New Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I am voting ofcourse but i wanted to add this note. There is going to be a lot of helpfull people leaving our list as soon as they are good with reseach
ygData.messageBody:
>
> Should this list be made moderated?
>

I am voting ofcourse but i wanted to add this note. There is going to be
a lot of helpfull people leaving our list as soon as they are good with
reseach and languages. The reason is simple,one has only to look at the
emails we r getting from this list from people who do refuse to abide by
the rules.

The end result is predictable, most of the knowledgeable people will
leave if they havent done so already,instead of hanging around helping
others. After all who wants to sort thu 60 spam emails,and if lucky
maybe find a couple related to research.


Bull
